snippet: Attorney General Janet Reno told California Indian tribes today that she would not step into a dispute with  California's Governor over gambling on Indian land, and she urged the tribes to sue if negotiations failed.    Seven representatives of th...
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Janet Reno told California Indian tribes today that she would not step into a dispute with California's Governor over gambling on Indian land, and she urged the tribes to sue if negotiations failed. Seven representatives of the more than 100 recognized California Indian groups met with Ms. Reno and pleaed for her help in resolving a standoff over lucrative operation of video slot machines, which the state considers illegal.
abstract: Atty Gen Janet Reno tells California Indian tribes that she will not step into dispute with Gov Pete Wilson over gambling on Indian land, and she urges tribes to sue if negotiations failed (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Reno Will Not Intervene In Tribal Casino Dispute
